Deep into the Sky

See the night sky beyond the limit of your eyes...

Deep into the Sky: the movie
  • Description
  • Visualizing the Universe
  • Credits




Description

The movie shows many layers of the sky, as if we were flipping through the pages of a book. Now let's pause at the main chapters and take the time to look at some fascinating pictures. The slideshow below will take you all the way to the Big Bang. Click the right arrow or swipe to start.

Towards the Big Bang





Visualizing the Universe



This is a slice of the Universe. We are located at the bottom. The top shows the edge of the observable Universe where the first flash of light, the cosmic microwave background, was emitted 13.7 billion years ago. In between, astronomers have detected millions of galaxies.







The view below shows another type of cut through the observable Universe. Scroll to the right to go all the way back to the time of the Big Bang.

→
